roleset.name: worthy of trust

role.descr: what arg1 upholds, preserves, carries through with

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on untrustworthy.01.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Yes. I personally know of one who-1 [*-1] is trustworthy with an infant.

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: What indicates to you that a person is trustworthy to do business with when you view their LinkedIn profile?
